resources.string: We need access to your mic to hear your guitar. It will only be used while the app is running. Tap OK in the next pop-up to allow this.
Try premium to enjoy unlimited access to all songs & lessons. Play anywhere, anytime.
The app will automatically recognise which string you play and give you tuning feedback for that string.
Tap on the screen to select which string to tune. The app will now give you tuning feedback for that string.
Point your device mic or headphones mic towards the guitar for an improved detection.
Tuning one string may affect the other strings. So after you\'ve tuned all strings, go over each string again to see that they are still in tune.
Guitars often goes out of tune. One common reason is change in temperature and humidity. So tune the guitar before each session, and sometime also during your session.
